title: So I got a Queue Dodge Penalty...
body:
I joined a ranked game, just like I would normally do. My internet is running fine and dandy. 
However, when I enter the champion select, the screen suddenly freezes. 

I couldn't do anything except close the client. After reopening it, I had to wait 30 mins and lost 10 LP (even though it was my first 
queue dodge, as far as I remember). I was kind of pissed since the client simply froze and I had to deal with this penalty. Don't know if this
is just me.

Yea it sounds like I'm whining but that just means I need to win one more game to get to where I wanted to get to now.

replies.body:
I checked out your account and I'm seeing that you had another queue dodge a few hours beforehand as well, which is why it deducted 10 LP instead of 3. 

Usually when I hear "client freeze" in champ select, it's either a result of an actual game crash or the player getting disconnected from the server.  If you're consistently running into these kinds of freezes I'd check out our [Bug Splat/Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) article or our [Connection Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)article which have solutions to the most common causes we see.  Based on how you described the issue, I'd check out the Game Crash article first, but wanted to link both just in case!
Riotbok, this isn't just him or his internet. please please please! Fix the issue. It's happening to me like everyday and im losing LP ONLY BECAUSE OF It. wow.
I just had the same issue, I get into a game and it will sometimes freeze.  The timer will stop at 0.  After a bit of time it unfreezes but I'm back at the main menu with LP deducted.

THis is a huge issue for ALOT of people.  Not just him.  This is getting old.  im sitting through a 30 min QUEUE right now becasue of this issue that is happening with all of my friends.  we have never had problems before.  our connection is just fine.  every signle thing i have read from riot is suggesting it is our fault when its this janky ass new client's fault.  i didnt even wanna switch to this new client in the first place.  FIX THIS!
